content.text:
# List of presidents of Angola__disambig_1

This article lists the presidents of Angola since the establishment of the office of president in 1975.
The current president is João Lourenço. He assumed the office on 26 September 2017.
Presidents of Angola (1975–present)

|-

Note: For details of the post of President of Angola, see President of Angola.
Timeline
This is a graphical lifespan timeline of the presidents of Angola. They are listed in order of first assuming office.
Colors =
id:mpla value:rgb(0.81,0.03,0.13) legend:People's_Movement_for_the_Liberation_of_Angola
id:gray1  value:gray(0.85)
id:gray2  value:gray(0.95)
DateFormat = dd/mm/yyyy
Period     = from:01/01/1975 till:31/12/+1}}
TimeAxis   = orientation:horizontal
ScaleMajor = gridcolor:gray1 unit:year increment:5 start:1975
ScaleMinor = gridcolor:gray2 unit:year increment:1 start:1975
Legend     = columns:1 left:150 top:35 columnwidth:170
TextData =
pos:(20,38) textcolor:black fontsize:M
text:"Political party:"
BarData =
bar:Neto
bar:dosSantos
bar:Lourenço
PlotData =
width:5 align:left fontsize:9 shift:(5,-4) anchor:till
bar:Neto
from: 11/11/1975 till: 10/09/1979 color:mpla text:"Agostinho Neto"
bar:dosSantos
from: 21/09/1979 till: 25/09/2017 color:mpla text:"José Eduardo dos Santos"
bar:Lourenço
from: 26/09/2017 till: $today     color:mpla text:"João Lourenço"
}}
The following chart lists presidents by lifespan (living presidents on the green line), with the years outside of their presidency in beige.
ImageSize = width:$width height:$height
PlotArea  = right:10 left:1 bottom:80 top:60
Period    = from:$start till:$end
TimeAxis  = orientation:horizontal
Legend    = orientation:vertical columns:1 left:0 top:50 columnwidth:500
Colors =
id:bg              value:white
id:lightline       value:rgb(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
id:lighttext       value:rgb(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)
id:LIFESPAN        value:rgb(0.88, 0.90, 0.70) Legend: Lifespan
id:MPLA      value:rgb(0.81, 0.04, 0.13)    Legend: People's_Movement_for_the_Liberation_of_Angola
id:NAME            value:rgb(0.15, 0.13, 0.05)
id:TODAY           value:green
BackgroundColors = canvas:bg
ScaleMinor = gridcolor:lightline unit:year increment:1 start:$start
ScaleMajor = gridcolor:lighttext unit:year increment:10 start:1920
LineData=
at:$now color:TODAY width:0.1
PlotData=
bar:1 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:17/09/1922 till:11/11/1975 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Agostinho Neto
color:MPLA
from:11/11/1975 till:10/09/1979
bar:2 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:28/08/1942 till:21/09/1979 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:José Eduardo dos Santos
color:MPLA
from:21/09/1979 till:25/09/2017
color:LIFESPAN
from:26/09/2017 till:08/07/2022
bar:3 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:05/03/1954 till:25/09/2017 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:João Lourenço
color:MPLA
from:26/09/2017 till:$now
TextData =
fontsize:M
textcolor:green
pos:($warning,30)
text:Updated /
TextData =
pos:(340,$height)
fontsize:L
textcolor:black
text:"Lifespan of each Angolan president"
}}
The following chart shows presidents by their age (living presidents in green), with the years of their presidency in blue. The vertical black line at 35 years indicates the minimum age to be president.
Santos color:pre from:30  till:37.07
bar:dosSantos color:pres from:37.07  till:75.08
bar:dosSantos color:post from:75.08  till:79.86
bar:Lourenço color:alive from:30  till:63.56
bar:Lourenço color:pres from:63.56  till:
LineData=
layer:front
at:35 width:1.5 color:black # Minimum age to be President
}}
